name: jcc2d
description: 一个轻量级的canvas渲染引擎

scripts.patch: npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && git add -A && git commit -m 'patch new version' && bower version patch
scripts.minor: npm --no-git-tag-version version minor && git add -A && git commit -m 'minor new version' && bower version minor
scripts.major: npm --no-git-tag-version version major && git add -A && git commit -m 'major new version' && bower version major

author: jasonChen
